docs.snippet: After two years of sniping (and worse) from critics, Chris Dercon has finally taken the helm of Berlin’s Volksbühne theater.

headline.print_headline: Storied Theater Gets New Leader. Cue Protests.

docs.snippet: Countless human-made troubles in the Indonesian capital pose an imminent threat to the city’s survival. And it has to deal with mounting threats from climate change.
